import React from 'react'; import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import './css/Home.css' class Home extends React.Component { state = { checkLogPas: false, menuNavigationHome: true, menuNavigationFavorites: false } signOut = (field) => event => { this.setState({ [field]: false }) delete localStorage["token"] } changeHome = event => { this.setState({menuNavigationHome: true, menuNavigationFavorites: false}) } changeFavorites = event => { this.setState({menuNavigationHome: false, menuNavigationFavorites: true}) } render () { console.log(this.state.menuNavigationHome) console.log(this.state.menuNavigationFavorites) return (
Главная
Избранное
Выйти
Поиск видео
) } } export default Home;
